name: Mech Warrior Battle Arena: Do they shoot stuff? What do the shoot?? Let's Find Out!
name_original: Mech Warrior Battle Arena: Do they shoot stuff? What do the shoot?? Let's Find Out!
description:
In a battle arena. Far, far away....
What happens? Will they fight?? Let's Find out!

Multiplayer game

XBox controllers are used for playing.

Control scheme: left and right stick for movement and aiming + left bumper fires a "wall"; right bumber fires a Gravitoid Ball, pressing it a second time detonates the Gravitoid, and pulls affected Mechs towards its center. (Repeat this multiple times for multiple "fun")

Good luck "fighting".
